Articles.Content: Hi. I recently installed a copy of KSP on a Linux machine. It runs smoothly, however, there are 2 weird rendering glitches/issues. One is that inside the VAB and SPH, it flicker continually between the proper rendering with the internals, and black. I was also flying to the Mun, until it dissapeared, but the reappeared once I was in close range to a small area. I am running Intel integrated graphics 4600.
What distro/version? Drivers version? Have you tried disabling compositor? Lowering graphics settings ingame? Running x86 binary?
@radonek Scientific Linux, v7.2. I have not tried those, and I may need to update drivers. The black screen has been fixed (known bug) but menu flickering has not.
